Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells are highly efficient, lowemission, and fuel-flexible energy conversion devices that can also run in reverse as solid oxide electrolysis cells, converting CO2 and/or H2O to useful fuels and pure O-2.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: Our team has recently developed a highly promising mixed conducting oxide catalyst (La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-delta) that can be used at both the anode and cathode in either the fuel cell or electrolysis mode in a lower-cost symmetrical cell.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: However, there is still a need to improve material processing and cell manufacturing methods in this field.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: Here, we report, for the first time, fabrication of a symmetrical solid oxide cell, based on our very promising catalysts, using rapid, low-cost, low-energy, and green microwave (MW) processing techniques.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: These cells were fabricated with MWsintered powders and were then MW-sintered without the use of any MW susceptors inside the electrode layers or any additional presintering steps.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: The catalyst layers show very stable nanostructures and do not delaminate, and the cells exhibit reaction rates that are similar to those obtained using normal ceramic processing methods.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: Importantly, the powder preparation and cell sintering steps, carried out using MW methods, require only ca.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods

Sentencas: 1/3 and 1/9 of the time/energy, respectively, versus those required in traditional furnace methods, thus translating to significant cost savings.
Titulo: Rapid and Low-Energy Fabrication of Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells by Microwave Methods
